title: Kialara
author: Kialara
content: Maxfield MellenbruchTwelve Roses, 2023Acrylic paints/stencils on primed and gessoed aluminum, stainless steel housingTwelve Roses represents twelve unique wallets; one for each of the twelve sections of Satoshi Nakamoto's white paper.Available in this auction is Rose: 7. Reclaiming Disk Space   •   Fingerprint signature on reverse     •   Hand-set 2.5mm natural earth-mined ruby with diamond cut.     •   Double-hinged case enveloped in authentic leather.   •   Permanent markers (red & black), water-soluble templates and Seed Phrase kit included.  Public and Private Key pairs or Seed Phrases can be encoded to this self-custodial wallet. See https://kialara.com/product/guardians/ to learn more about this storage format and to see how it works. Thanks, everyone! Photo Galleryhttps://imgur.com/a/VTvXRjoAuction Terms:Starting Bid:  0.001 btcBid Increments:  0.001 btc (or multiples of). Bid Format: 0.001 btcAuction end time *if there is no bid in the final 5 minutes:Auction Ends: Thursday, November 9th 2023, 1PM Pacific (California)Countdown: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/wrestling?iso=20231109T13&p0=770&msg=AUCTION+%27Twelve+Roses%27+Kialara+Self-Custodial+Bitcoin+Wallet+7+of+12&font=cursiveThe auctions will end at the time stated above unless there is a bid placed in the final 5 minutes of the auction. If a bid is placed within the final 5 minutes of the auction, the new auction end time will be 5 minutes after the last bid. (i.e. if a bid is placed at 12:57pm, the new auction end time is 1:02pm) The auction end time will then extend 5 minutes ad infinitum until no new, valid bid has been placed for 5 minutes.I may exclude bidders, or require a deposit for any bidders at my discretion. If you are a new account but a previous customer of mine, please PM prior to bidding to introduce yourself.Shipping & Insurance: Free insured shipping to USA, $45 international (express) w/ buyer responsible for insurance if desired.Direct payments only to this address or contact for private address:  bc1qrgzjnr9au8htdlgtacfd2pg2hfgc06nz4de0ryBTC payment due in full within 24 hours of auction end, or item will be re-listed/offered to next-highest bidder.I will not contact you outside of this forum! Please be careful.

comments.author: Cyrus
comments.body: 0.013BTCWill this, belatedly, be my first Kialara?

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: Cyrus on November 07, 2023, 04:23:33 PM0.013BTCWill this, belatedly, be my first Kialara?No.  0.014 BTCThanks for making this available via the forum, Max.Would love to get one of these, maybe one or two more auctions? I guess quite a few of us are interested.Just kidden, Cyrus, GL in this auction.

comments.author: Kialara
comments.body: Thanks for the bids, all! Kryptowerk, I think so... haloxon,

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Question: Are each one of these numbers directly correlated with the number of the section on the Bitcoin whitepaper? So number 7 should be "Reclaiming Disk Space"?EDIT: I AM AN IDIOT AND DIDN'T SEE THAT AT THE TOP OF THIS POST LOL. IGNORE ME
